articles.title: 2026 software stock outlook: Analyst's top pick
articles.mainIdea: 2026 software stock outlook: Analyst's top pick
articles.summary: Yahoo Finance Video: 2026 software stock outlook: Analyst's top pick. Software stocks underperformed the market in 2025, but Macquarie US head of software and services research Steve Koenig says 2026 could be different. Watch the video above to hear the analyst's bullish outlook and top stock pick in the space. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination. Related tickers mentioned: IGV, MQBKY.

articles.title: DDOG vs. FIVN: Which Cloud Software Stock is the Better Buy Now?
articles.mainIdea: DDOG vs. FIVN: Which Cloud Software Stock is the Better Buy Now?
articles.summary: Zacks: DDOG vs. FIVN: Which Cloud Software Stock is the Better Buy Now?. Datadog and Five9 both play critical roles in enterprise cloud software, but differences in growth drivers, AI focus and valuation shape the debate. Related tickers mentioned: FIVN.
